# underPageBackgroundColor

**Instance Property**

The color the web view displays behind the active page, visible when the user scrolls beyond the bounds of the page.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var underPageBackgroundColor: NSColor! { get set }
```

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var underPageBackgroundColor: UIColor! { get set }
```

## Discussion

The web view derives the default value of this property from the content of the page, using the background colors of the `<html>` and `<body>` elements with the background color of the web view. To override the default color, set this property to a new color.

## Inspecting the view information

- **scrollView**: The scroll view associated with the web view.
- **title**: The page title.
- **url**: The URL for the current webpage.
- **mediaType**: The media type for the contents of the web view.
- **customUserAgent**: The custom user agent string.
- **serverTrust**: The trust management object you use to evaluate trust for the current webpage.
- **hasOnlySecureContent**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the web view loaded all resources on the page through securely encrypted connections.
- **themeColor**: The theme color that the system gets from the first valid meta tag in the webpage.
